text.author: Wikipedia
text.title: Charles J. Fillmore
text.summary: Charles J. Fillmore was an American linguist and Professor of Linguistics at the University of California, Berkeley, and one of the founders of Cognitive Linguistics, known for his work on the theory of Frame Semantics and FrameNet, as well as his contributions to the development of Construction Grammar.
